markdown.markdown:
::: {#intro-heading} [Pronunciation](https://namedrop.io/mariasanchezlinares) She/her/ella ## Education Macalester College \| St. Paul MN
B.A. in Data Science & Economics \| Sept 2021 - May 2025 ::: ## About me I am data science and economics student largely interested in solving social and economic problems with data-based solution. I have coursework Data Analysis and Visualization, Machine Learning, Statistical Modeling, Environmental and Economic Policy. I have a foundation in data-driven research and am looking for opportunities to get hands-on work experience. I have a passion for social justice, and blending my expertise, I aim to leverage data to inform innovative solutions to real-world challenges in the business and policy-making realms. ## Personal I was born and raised in Valencia, Venezuela. At the age of 18, I received a [United World College](https://www.uwc.org/about) scholarship to attend UWC Red Cross Nordic in Flekke, Norway. After finishing the International Baccalaureate diploma, I moved to Saint Paul, MN to start my undergraduate studies at Macalester College. I find joy in embracing new adventures and experiences. I am not your typical outdoors enthusiast, but I like skiing and kayaking. I also enjoy exploring new flavors through food touring and baking. Most recently, I am preparing for my next journey. I have always loved traveling, and I am excited to be studying abroad in Málaga, Spain come spring 2024. ## Get in touch **Email:** msanche2@macalester.edu
